thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Lill Bowden Fulton
thread.title_full: Airtasker reviewed by Lill Bowden Fulton

author: Lill Bowden Fulton
title: Lill Bowden Fulton
text: I was really dreaming when I posted my desperate task at 9-30 on a Sunday night. It was a carpet laying job. To have someone come and have the job completed with great professionalism by 12 noon on the Monday, wow.. I am a convert... Thank you Airtasker, my boss thinks I am a genius!!!
